review: AWESOME! Get totally buried in cool wallpapers!! There are reams of them - and ALL FREE!! Great quality; no fuzz or blurred images, and a great, varied selection of images, swirls, blobbies and patterns! THANK-YOU, A BILLION!!!
This is an extremely good app and very easy to use. The wallpapers look amazing and there are a lot of categories! Keep up the good work!
I think I just found my favorite minimal wallpaper app.... No ads clean UI. I wish there were more wallpapers but but its still a 5 star app regardless

Most of the reviews here a fake, and the developer likes to be childish with anyone who doesn't spew out amazing reviews. Unfortunately, humans are not review bots, and as such, most do not like this app. Bugs are quite common and annoying, crashes still happen after so many (probably useless) updates, and the wallpapers are clearly not 4k. The categories are ok, but it's almost impossible to find a wallpaper you really like. When you do find one, expect to be disappointed by blurriness anyway.

review: Wallpapers are just awesome so happy to find this app and trying it

First wallpaper app in a while that got me a little interested to download it. Unfortunately though, when I launch the app it says "license valid" on a toast type message within the app and then all of what I assume to be wallpapers stay grey with a bar in the middle. The thumbnails wont load. I've tried waiting for a minute, but it's not my wifi, or data that's causing the issue. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling. Nothing's worked yet though. Willing to give a chance still! Has promise.

This is a very good app (no, no one gave me money to say this) the only option that is missing for me is a option of Random Walls, there are a lot of them so finding one can be very difficult at times, a randomizer or daily wallpapers would be awesome.

Well I must say this is one app that is really nothing but wallpapers, no annoying ads, no pop up ads, the wallpapers in there is sweet too, I like the minimal and pastel category!
